review: Love it! I can now watch what I want instead of what is scheduled. I don't have a real fast internet connection and I can still use it without buffering while I use my laptop, except when I have to upload a large file for college. Lots of choices, too! Did take me a bit of trying to get it set up as the instructions aren't real clear.

review: Great little product for Prime members! Streaming quality of amazon content is surprisingly good. Convenience of the remote (compared to tethering my Kindle via HDMI cable) is a welcome addition to our viewing experience. Love the screensaver slide show, too. Haven't tried it with Netflix or any other providers/games.
author: Constance J Claffy

review: Worth every penny. I have used Amazon streaming video for a couple of years now thru a PS3, but this is so much better, easier & completely reliable & it's a breeze to set up. Watching Youtube on an HDTV is worth the cost, but there is so much more! Can't recommend highly enough.
